typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	UpdateTime as string
}
source(output(
		status as string,
		partyId as string,
		policyRole as string,
		updateTime as string,
		IPAddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	singleDocument: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(DerivedColumn = toTimestamp(left(updateTime, length(updateTime) - 4),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(input(
		{_id} as string,
		partyId as string,
		updateTime as timestamp,
		IPAddress as string,
		documentContext as string,
		document as string,
		submissionId as string,
		submissionVersion as string,
		policyId as string,
		referenceDocumenId as string,
		status as string,
		policyRole as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		updateTime = DerivedColumn
	)) ~> sink1
